plot: Gwen and Ben find themselves abducted into the future in order to help their future selves with a problem, but Dr. Animo keeps them busy by reanimating Vilgax.

Gwen is abducted through a portal, so Ben changes to XLR8 and follows after her. They find that Gwen's adult self came back in time to bring Ben into the future, saying that, although Ben's adult self has mastered the Omnitrix, he still needs some help that only his younger self can provide. It's not, however, the combined threat of Dr. Animo and Vilgax that she worries about.—Jesse Sanchez
